content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good afternoon, Mr. Trabelsi. Thank you for your interest in our apartment. We do have a very competitive rental price that is sure to attract a wide range of tenants. May I ask what your budget is for a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. I am a student and I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. How much is the rental price?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I understand your concerns, Mr. Trabelsi. We do have a very reasonable rental price that takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the quality of the building and its amenities. Would you be able to provide me with more details about your budget and the length of your stay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for a monthly rental of 500 Euros. I can stay in Mannheim for at least 1 year.

I am a student and I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I am interested in the apartment in Mannheim.

I agree to the rental price of 500 Euros per month.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest in our apartment, Mr. Trabelsi. We are pleased to accept your offer of 500 Euros per month for a 1 year lease. We understand your budget and your commitment to being a responsible tenant, and we are happy to have you as a part of our community. Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement or the move-in process.
name: Heinrich Heine
